* Zyber looks with shock as Striker sat up, threw up mech fluid and then lays back down, she knew that he was bad but not this bad!
 She sighed as she remade the damp cloth and then places another cloth over his optics, she removes the soiled furs and replaces them with fresh ones.
Zyber looked up at Rowdy, she couldn't wait for his answer any longer, she had to act NOW!
With a second sigh she transforms into her beast mode and walks towards the door, she looks back at Rowdy.*

" I know that you are a Predacon and he a Maximal but please do not harm him while I am gone, every bot deserves a chance to live."

* With those words said she ventured out into the dying light in search of the plants in which she needed to heal Striker.*

_________________________________________________

* Iron Raptor looked at Prowl as he headed for the doors, she then looked back at Teltoli and smiled the best she could.*

" Never mind about saying who else is out there, just go and get yourself repaired. I'll see you later, alright?"

* With those last words she stood and began to follow Prowl outside, she came up beside him and kept pace. Despite her weakness there was still a job to carry out and if Liono wasn't going to do it then she would!
She growled as she came to the doors, now to business!*
